class.name: AWA.Wikis.Models.Wiki_Image_Info
class.comment: The information about an image used in a wiki page.

query.name: wiki-image
query.comment: Get the description of an image used in a wiki page.
query.sql: SELECT image.storage_id, image.width, image.height FROM awa_wiki_space AS wiki INNER JOIN awa_storage_folder AS folder ON folder.workspace_id = wiki.workspace_id INNER JOIN awa_image AS image ON folder.id = image.folder_id INNER JOIN awa_storage AS file ON image.storage_id = file.id WHERE wiki.id = :wiki_id AND folder.name = :folder_name AND file.name = :file_name

query.name: wiki-image-get-data
query.comment: Get the data content of the Wiki image.
query.sql: SELECT store.mime_type, store.create_date, store.uri, store.storage, data.data FROM awa_storage AS store INNER JOIN awa_wiki_space AS wiki LEFT JOIN awa_acl AS acl ON acl.entity_id = wiki.workspace_id AND acl.entity_type = :table AND acl.user_id = :user_id LEFT JOIN awa_storage_data AS data ON store.store_data_id = data.id WHERE store.id = :store_id AND wiki.id = :wiki_id AND (wiki.is_public OR NOT acl.id IS NULL)
